Has there been any user abuse of the crossing in the last year
Provide any additional information, such as history of abuse, effect of any mitigation measures that have been installed

The chance of a vehicle user deliberately abusing the crossing is estimated to be {1}, which has been overwritten to be {2}. This is based on approach speeds of {3}. You may adjust this estimate ONLY if you are sure that other factors exist that have not been modelled such as a particularly fast approach road which may result in ziz-zag or running the lights.
